                         PublicKey publicKey)
                  throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Encrypt a message. The function should encrypt arbitrary long message
        Type Parameters:
        T - The encoded blocks type
        Parameters:
        message - clear text message
        publicKey -
        Returns:
        the encrypted message. A Queue of encrypted blocks

      • decrypt

        java.lang.String decrypt​(java.util.Queue<T> code,
                         PrivateKey secretKey)
                  throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Decrypt a message. The function should decrypt arbitrary long encrypted message
        Parameters:
        code - Queue of blocks, which is the encrypted message
        secretKey -
        Returns:
        the decrypted message in clear text
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - thrown if wrong key type used
